import "./Home.css" import React,{useState} from 'react' function Home() { const moviesList=[ { title:"Titanic", year:2003, poster:"http", img:"./Titanic.jpeg", type:"Film" }, { title:"StarWars", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./starwar.jpeg", type:"Film" }, { title:"MAMA", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./MaMa.jpg", type:"Film" }, { title:"BlackForest", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./Black_Forest.jpg", type:"Cooking" }, { title:"Bonda", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./Bonda.jpg", type:"Cooking" }, { title:"Paneer", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./Panneer_Butter.jpg", type:"Cooking" }, { title:"BondPizzaa", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./Pizza.jpg", type:"Cooking" }, { title:"American Snipper", year:"2020", poster:"http", img:"./American.jpg", type:"Film" }, { title:"Time Rush", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./TimeRush.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Chathuram", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./Chathuram.avif", type:"Film" }, { title:"Excaliber", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./Excaliber.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Peppa Pig", year:1993, poster:"http", img:"./peppapig.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Mickey Mouse", year:1994, poster:"http", img:"./Disney.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"OOgy the Cockroach", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./OOgy.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Arcane", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./Arcane.jpg", type:"Cartoon" }, { title:"Mr.Bean", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./Bean.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, { title:"Bhai", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./Bhai.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, { title:"Harry Porter", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./HarryPorter.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, { title:"Good News", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./GoodNews.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, { title:"Hatty Boy", year:1997, poster:"http", img:"./HattyBoy.jpg", type:"Comedy" }, ] const[movie,setMovie]=useState(moviesList) const onlyMovie =(type)=>{ let newmovie=moviesList.filter((movitem)=>movitem.type==type) setMovie(newmovie) } const onlyCartoon =(type)=>{ let newCartoon =moviesList.filter((caritem)=>caritem.type==type) setMovie(newCartoon) } const allList =() =>{ setMovie(moviesList) } return( <>
